programme.title: Elton John
programme.desc: This 90 minute special tells the story behind the 20 greatest songs ever recorded by Elton John. Mixing rich archive footage and home videos with new interviews, the documentary paints a picture of the man behind the music, telling the story of how these timeless songs came about and what impact they had on the world.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 12
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud - EP 1
programme.desc: The funniest videos on the internet, guaranteed to Make You Laugh Out Loud. This show celebrates the amazing wealth of talented and funny animals and people to be found on the internet. Featuring the best UGC from around the world, behavioural experts and other comedy talent providing a commentary into the world of LOL.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is K. King Kino from Planet K is celebrating his birthday. Can our superheroes present him with a present from Planet Earth that is fit for a King?

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 11
programme.desc: A barn owl scares Leo in the garden. The Junior Rangers depart for the grasslands to find a better hunting place for the barn owl. Leo comes across a baby Asian elephant while planting an apple tree. To find the elephant's mother, the Junior Rangers explore the lowland forest.

programme.title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: WINNIE THE POOH, TIGGER and the gang have a new friend - an adorable six-year-old girl named DARBY - joining them for new adventures in the Hundred Acre Wood.

programme.title: Babar And The Adventures Of Badou - EP 55
programme.desc: Adventure in Celestville! From Pirate Adventures to The Rescuteers, Badou is our fearless leader and we see him in action as the head of the rescue club and he visits his friend Chiku in Monkeyville. Every episode is a true adventure as Babar, Badou, and all his friends explore the exciting world of Celestville.

programme.title: Sesame Street 46 - EP 0021 & 0022
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.desc: Fun-loving jet plane Jett delivers packages to children around the world in this animated series. programme.desc: In the new season of Pokemon, a mysterious Pokemon, Nebby, suddenly appears before Ash. With Nebby causing all kinds of trouble, will the Pokemon school experience be even more chaotic than usual!? What's more, Legendary Pokemon Solgaleo and Lunala will make an appearance this season. Look forward to the further adventures of Ash and Pikachu!

programme.desc: Dora and Boots need to get home for Dora's birthday party. But before they can jump out of the Magic Storybook, a wind blows them into Wizzle World. Here, they need to take the crystal to the Wishing Wizzle on Wizzle Mountain, so he can wish them home!

programme.title: Kody Kapow - EP 15
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 19
programme.desc: Arashi longs to follow his father's footsteps to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner. He partners up with the Wild Liger and forms the new Team Freedom. Together, they will face many adventures, including the main antagonists the Death Metal Empire!

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 9
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 7
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: DinoCore - EP 0005 & 0006
programme.desc: "Baryon", the great Dino Master of Dino Star, is defeated by the evil "Darkno". Before he dies, he sends his three most trusted DinoCores: Tyranno, Saber and Stego, to Earth with the ancient guardian Dino Tuner. Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: Super4orce - EP 2
programme.desc: While Jake, TJ, Joe and Wanda learn to control their powers, school property and students' belongings go missing. And Jake who is unable to control his powers, is approached by the mysterious man Vincent. Vincent warns Jake of an impending threat. Jake is unsure if he should believe this man. But when the thief strikes again, Jake, TJ, Joe and Wanda find themselves caught in the action to stop the villain. Unsure of what to do after they catch the thief, they turn to Vincent.

programme.title: Midnight Stallion
programme.desc: 15 year old Megan Shepherd and her parents will do anything to save their struggling farm. When the family discovers a wild stallion in a nearby forest they begin to wonder if this could be the answer to their prayers.

programme.title: British Summer Time - Pharrell Williams
programme.desc: Considered one of the worlds most prolific producers and performers, Pharrell Williams is the force behind so many incredible smash hits, including Kelis Milkshake, N.E.R.Ds Lap Dance and Grammy award-winning and feel-good track Happy. Having worked with music legends from Britney to Justin Timberlake, Daft Punk to Snoop Dogg, the rare pop alchemist performs tracks from his illustrious career. Tracks include: Get Lucky, Happy, Come get it Bae and Rockstar.

Cut off from everything they know, the team ventures into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape a primal Eden in which humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Tarzan 2
programme.desc: An awkward young TARZAN decides that his ape family will be better off without him and sets off to find his place in the world. An encounter with a rogue family of gorillas sends Tarzan up to the mysterious Dark Mountain and finding a reluctant mentor in ZUGOR, who shows him how to find his own set of jungle skills and learn that even though he's not an ape, he's something much more amazing and wonderful - he's Tarzan!

However, when the 3 boys need her help to catch the invisible villain, Wanda finds it hard to refuse. After saving the day, a strange encounter with another mysterious man - Mr Smith, makes Super4orce doubt Vincents intentions. Just then strange electric bolts start shooting about.

Just as Xin Xin is about to get into an incident with an electronic scooter, Ping Pong comes to her rescue. (PG)力生饱尝丧子之痛，却为了照顾欣欣而隐忍，直到欣欣再次无理取闹发脾气，力生情绪终于失控，大骂欣欣。欣欣伤心离家，碰巧Ping Pong上门前来探望，看到欣欣魂不守舍，偷偷跟踪。欣欣差点被电动滑板车撞上，Ping Pong及时出面相救。.

programme.title: 三把刀 King Of Culinary - EP 7

These talents could be teachers, lawyers, designers with a day job, but when they get home, they turn into highly-skilled chefs in their own kitchen. In every episode for a total of 13 weeks, the culinary talent challenges three celebrity chefs in three different rounds. Who will emerge as the final winner? 三把刀，崭新的厨艺擂台比赛！我们常听说律师平时打官司，周末变厨师；老师、设计师、家庭主妇等不少烹调高手其实就在民间！节目发掘这些隐藏的烹调素人， 与三位明星大厨展开大对决！！民间高手得把三个名厨一个一个干掉，才能夺得三把刀和丰富奖金！刀光剑影，谁的刀最锋利！是名厨呢？还是卧虎藏龙的高手呢？三把刀，精彩可期！.

programme.title: 我的万里挑一 My One In A Million - EP 18

She realises that she was the girl that Zheng Hong met when he was young, and decides to expose Carol's true colours. However, it went against her when she gets framed by someone...... (PG)正鸿上电视接受访问，说起自己和女友Carol因为小时候在树林迷路而认识的经过。甄晴听后激动不已，发现Carol冒充她的身份，抢走正鸿。原来小时候和正鸿迷路的小女孩正是甄晴，她决定揭穿Carol的真面目，不料反被人栽赃嫁祸……。.

(PG13-灵异题材)孟如来到一户人家，传来吵闹的声响，只听见是一个阿公在不断地对着一旁的阿婆飙怒骂，只见老人拿出一把菜刀往对方丢去。孟如探查后发现，原来阿婆是刚去世的孤魂，却没有前往地府报到，所以一直滞留在家里，继续照顾着患上失智症的丈夫。.

After some investigation, Lei Jinghong finds out that the baby was sent to Flame Villa, and he intends to find the whereabouts of his step-sister. (PG)霹雳门少主雷惊鸿让银雪帮他和刀无暇的妹妹刀冽香留在烈火山庄。雷惊鸿告诉刀冽香说他进入烈火山庄另有目的。他的继母艳娘当年曾经生过一个女孩，但是很快就夭折了。经过调查，这个女孩就在烈火山庄，他来这里也是为了找自己同父异母的妹妹。.

programme.title: 谢谢你不离不弃 By Your Side - EP 3

As the mother of the twins, Melinda faced double the caregiving pressure when they were babies, as mothers of multiples do. When the boys were 2-year-old, Melinda could tell there was something not quite usual with them... they didn't react to anything and threw many tantrums because they couldn't express their needs. When specialists confirmed the boys' conditions, both Melinda and her husband were devastated. (重)对一般母亲来说，生育双胞胎是喜悦的，但连带也是双重的压力，得同时兼顾两个婴儿的需求并不是一件容易的事。对美玲而言，双胞胎儿子约两岁的时候被怀疑是自闭症，那个打击更是加倍的沉重。眼见孩子无法沟通，不能克制的发脾气，夫妻俩是一筹莫展，几乎崩溃。长年的来回奔波，让她感到无比的疲劳、无助，一度还很绝望。尽管如此，她从没想过要放弃。双胞胎现年20岁了，妈妈早已摸索出一套方式来教导他们。她希望藉由自己的经历，鼓励其他的父母不要封闭有特许需求的孩子，他们就跟普通的孩子一样，需要玩乐、社交，更需要被爱、被关怀。.

Recalling that the address of the bar sent to him was where Ai Ling used to work at, he suspects something is off and finds an excuse to send Zi Jian to escort Si Ting home instead. Knowing her plan fell through, Ai Ling feels unhappy. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)爱玲带思婷到她以前工作的酒廊喝酒，还将她和男友在这里分手的事情告诉她。思婷喝醉，爱玲故意用思婷的手机传简讯给立威，要他来接思婷。立威发现地址是爱玲以前工作的酒廊，产生怀疑，便找借口让子健去接。爱玲计划失败，内心暗气。.

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 12

programme.title: 梦想的声音 Sound Of My Dream S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Sound Of My Dream is a music program which invites Chinese pop singers to challenge musicians and other singers to pit their skills. Mentors and singers put in their best to show the essence of music, regardless of the outcome. (重)《梦想的声音》（原《声音的战争》）是一档由浙江卫视所打造的音乐节目，邀请到华语乐坛歌手面对面进行“歌艺过招”，导师与素人歌手抛开所有包袱，毫无保留的相互讨教，竭尽所能展现出音乐本质。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Squeaky-clean Peifen will encounter banned drugs up-close. Fear not, she is not about to do anything illegal. Our spunky host will also discover opium artefacts possibly from the 1930s, housed in the middle of a Bishan residential estate! As well as a rumoured cure for opium addiction that involves a cup of tea and a special bed. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (重)“谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Having experienced the magical Istria Peninsula, this episode of "Forbidding No More" continues down South, along the coast of the majestic Adriatic Sea, to explore what the Dalmatia region of Croatia has to offer. (重)(最后一集)经历了伊斯特拉半岛的精彩，这一集的《极境之旅》继续往克罗地亚的南部前进，沿着美丽的亚得里亚海，探索达尔马提亚地区的迷人魅力。.

programme.title: 我的女兒琴四月 My Daughter, Geum Sa-weol - EP 67
programme.desc: (R) Canbin breaks up with Siyue when he realises that Siyue is not really supportive of Wanhou and him. In the video that Zhixiang left behind before his death, he wants the competing teams to list a construction material that can withstand the test of time. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)灿彬发现四月其实不是支持他和万厚的，于是说他从来没有爱过四月，要四月去追求她的幸福。志翔生前留下录影，内含千谜宫竞赛课题。第一个竞赛课题就是要竞赛队伍说出可以战胜岁月的建材。.

programme.title: 我的女兒琴四月 My Daughter, Geum Sa-weol - EP 68
programme.desc: (R) Huixiang bribes fake witnesses to testify in her favour in court. Shixun summons Wuyue to take the stand in court. Huixiang faints when she sees Wuyue before her and then escapes when she is sent to a hospital for treatment. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧翔的案件开庭。慧翔收买假证人上庭说出对她有利的证词。世勋传召五月出庭，慧翔看到五月活生生地出现在她面前，因一时激动而在庭上晕倒，审理暂停。慧翔过后从医院逃走。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) The Blue House experiences a blackout after an EMP bomb attack. The President disappears after three gunshots. Taiqing is accused to be General Yang's murderer. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)青瓦台被电磁脉冲(EMP)弹袭击而导致电力瘫痪，总统在三声枪响后失踪。泰庆提供的证据查无对证，结果反被怀疑是杀害杨达浩的凶手。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Taiqing deduces that the Chief of Secret Service, Xian Fengxiu, is the sniper. However, Fengxiu, in turn, frames him and Taiqing becomes a fugitive. Baoyuan escorts Taiqing to the police station for investigations. Taiqing knocks her out and disguises as a police officer to flee from arrest. A legal team member, Li Ciying, suspects that Fengxiu is the real assassin and tries to locate Taiqing. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)泰庆推理后发现护卫室长咸奉秀就是狙击者，却被其嫁祸成了逃犯。宝媛掩护泰庆到派出所调查车祸，但泰庆因被通缉，不得已打晕宝媛伪装成警察逃走。法务组组员李次英怀疑奉秀才是狙击犯，于是试图寻找泰庆的下落。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 23
programme.desc: Haiying texts her cousin who will be getting married the next day in a family chat group and Haiying wants to catch the bouquet. She scandalises her chat group members by saying she'll bring Daojing to the wedding and Haiying's mother stomped into her room and scolded her, having read the whole message. (PG-些许性相关语)(双声道-中/韩)海英在家庭聊天室发表了她在明天堂妹的婚礼上要接手花。 她还说她会把道京带去婚礼。看完整个简讯后，海英的妈妈冲到她的房间，教训了她一顿。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 24
programme.desc: Daojing sees the vision of himself in a car accident and he has a feeling that he will die. He does not want to die with regret, so he proclaimed to Haiying that his love for her is 100%, and he will not leave her unless he dies. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)道京在视觉上看到自己在车祸中将死去。他不想感到后悔就向海英坦承自己对她的爱是百分百的，而且在死之前都不会离开她。.

programme.title: 小当家 Little Maestros - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Huang Dengfeng lives in Changhua, Taiwan in a family of 5. Born to a father with mental illness and Vietnamese bride mother, 13-year-old Dengfeng is forced to be independent and into a father's role to tend to younger siblings. Witness our little maestro's dedication to his family in this episode. (重)黄登丰一家五口住在台湾彰化县。爸爸患有精神障碍，妈妈是外籍新娘，所以年仅13岁的登丰个性很独立，很多时候都会撑起担任父亲的角色，照顾弟妹和自己的生活起居。看这一集的小当家如何尽心尽力的为家庭奉献。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Acting blur allows women to breeze through difficult situations, but is it necessary? Act-blur Queen Vivian Lai has something to share! Expect a fun-filled episode as our artistes discuss about their personal encounters with "silly" colleagues or being "silly" themselves! (重)名嘴来咯！装傻是不是女人最厉害的武器？装傻鼻祖赖怡伶现身说法。节目将讨论男人女人在职场上和感情里装傻的利与弊！装傻似乎是女人的权利，那男人装傻是否可以大小通吃？除了爆料也有笑料！你怎么能够错过啊？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Zhekui sees Xiantai, Xiuqing and Xiaoxun together. He photographs them and posts the photos on the company's forum site. Xiantai is worried that he has affected Xiuqing's reputation, but Xiuqing thinks nothing of it. Zaiyong warns Xiuqing that her lack of reservation will do more harm to Xiantai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰、秀卿和小勋和乐融融的照片被同事金哲奎上传到公司的留言板上。贤泰担心影响秀卿在公司的声誉，秀卿却不当一回事。载永看到照片后，警告秀卿说她将令贤泰的处境变得很为难。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) A young patient is diagnosed with appendicitis and needs urgent operation. Unfortunately, the hospital ship lacks surgical facilities. Meantime, Enzai arrives and without delay, transforms the dental consultation room into an operating room and operated on him, saving his life. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)船上一位小孩得了盲肠炎要立刻施手术，可惜医疗船上根本没有手术室的设备能替患者做手术，这时恩在来到，决定用船上仅有的牙科的工具，在牙科椅子上做开腹手术，最后成功救活患者。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 65
programme.desc: Jinghui stops Yingshu from passing the content of the safe to Shiyan. Days later, Yingshu is deeply disappointed with Jinghui when she finds out that not only has Jinghui kept everything in the safe for herself, she has also maligned Shiyan and kicked her out of the company. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)英淑要将奇泰的遗物交给世妍，京慧却阻止她，并说自己会把保险箱内所有的东西交到世妍手上。数日后，英淑发现京慧不但没有把奇泰的遗物交给世妍，而且还诬陷世妍把她赶出公司。英淑对京慧大失所望。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 66
programme.desc: Qitai had a secret safe in the bank that can only be unlocked by Mingxiu's offspring. Jinghui enlists Minghuan's help to obtain access to the safe. In exchange, Minghuan wants Jinghui to take care of his family and also chase Yingshu away from her side. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)原来奇泰当年在银行登记了秘密保险箱。民秀的后代必须在银行职员的见证下采集DNA样本，证明是民秀的女儿，才可以打开保险箱。京慧找明焕帮她打开保险箱，并答应将保险箱里面的钱都给明焕。明焕要京慧安顿他的家人，并把英淑赶走，就答应她。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 8
programme.desc: Kai Xiang is horrified at what he saw. To comfort him, Xiao Qi shows him the photograph of Kloudiia and a small boy to prove that Kloudiia is not dead. The trio decides to return to the restaurant for answers and discovers that Kloudiia had indeed brought her son to the restaurant. Kai Xiang is left with more questions. Why was Kloudiia covered in blood? And where did the child go? Xiao Qi suggests that they head to Moscow to find answers. (PG)凯翔为自己幻想到的恐怖画面惊恐不已。为了安抚凯翔，筱琦将照片拿给凯翔，证明Kloudiia没有死。那是一张Kloudiia和一个小男孩的合照。三人于是决定回到餐厅寻找答案，并从中得知Kloudiia曾带儿子到那里就餐，但后来出现的就只有Kloudiia 一人。眼下的凯翔有了更多的疑团，究竟为何Kloudiia的身上沾满鲜血，而之后为什么孩子再也没出现在Kloudiia身旁。筱琦提议去莫斯科寻找Kloudiia解开谜团，因为那是唯一的线索。火车上，凯翔梦见Kloudiia对着一个双目紧闭的小孩哼唱着俄文歌，没想到这首歌正是凯翔寻找记忆的关键线索！.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 8
programme.desc: Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. 幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 19

But his political opponents soon kidnap his wife and daughter to force him to withdraw from the election. (PG13-暴力镜头)李铁岳入院检查身体，不料却遭枪手袭击，幸亏他命大侥幸逃过一劫。但对方随即绑架其妻儿，逼他自动退出竞选。.

Why was Kloudiia covered in blood? And where did the child go? Xiao Qi suggests that they head to Moscow to find answers. programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Kai Xiang is horrified at what he saw. To comfort him, Xiao Qi shows him the photograph of Kloudiia and a small boy to prove that Kloudiia is not dead. The trio decides to return to the restaurant for answers and discovers that Kloudiia had indeed brought her son to the restaurant. Kai Xiang is left with more questions. Why was Kloudiia covered in blood? And where did the child go? Xiao Qi suggests that they head to Moscow to find answers. (PG)(重)凯翔为自己幻想到的恐怖画面惊恐不已。为了安抚凯翔，筱琦将照片拿给凯翔，证明Kloudiia没有死。那是一张Kloudiia和一个小男孩的合照。三人于是决定回到餐厅寻找答案，并从中得知Kloudiia曾带儿子到那里就餐，但后来出现的就只有Kloudiia 一人。眼下的凯翔有了更多的疑团，究竟为何Kloudiia的身上沾满鲜血，而之后为什么孩子再也没出现在Kloudiia身旁。筱琦提议去莫斯科寻找Kloudiia解开谜团，因为那是唯一的线索。火车上，凯翔梦见Kloudiia对着一个双目紧闭的小孩哼唱着俄文歌，没想到这首歌正是凯翔寻找记忆的关键线索！.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. (重)幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 65
programme.desc: (R) Jinghui stops Yingshu from passing the content of the safe to Shiyan. Days later, Yingshu is deeply disappointed with Jinghui when she finds out that not only has Jinghui kept everything in the safe for herself, she has also maligned Shiyan and kicked her out of the company. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英淑要将奇泰的遗物交给世妍，京慧却阻止她，并说自己会把保险箱内所有的东西交到世妍手上。数日后，英淑发现京慧不但没有把奇泰的遗物交给世妍，而且还诬陷世妍把她赶出公司。英淑对京慧大失所望。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 66
programme.desc: (R) Qitai had a secret safe in the bank that can only be unlocked by Mingxiu's offspring. Jinghui enlists Minghuan's help to obtain access to the safe. In exchange, Minghuan wants Jinghui to take care of his family and also chase Yingshu away from her side. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)原来奇泰当年在银行登记了秘密保险箱。民秀的后代必须在银行职员的见证下采集DNA样本，证明是民秀的女儿，才可以打开保险箱。京慧找明焕帮她打开保险箱，并答应将保险箱里面的钱都给明焕。明焕要京慧安顿他的家人，并把英淑赶走，就答应她。.

programme.title: Fresh! 新登场 - 青春的旋律 Fresh Takes - Rhythm Of Youth
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (重)开学第一天，霍青玥和闺蜜Gina匆匆赶往学校。Gina想到即将和KKBoyz的施凯旋和Ken同校，雀跃万分。不料，青玥竟误打误撞在校门外跟凯旋起了争执，两人不欢而散。更意外的是，凯旋和青玥还成了同班同学。至此之后，两人一见面就发生一连串倒霉事，令人哭笑不得。有一次，青玥误会凯旋和Ken欺负女生而出手相助，结果却因此误伤凯旋，害他不能参赛。青玥为了赔罪，当起了凯旋的私人保镖，还帮他克服了视线恐惧症。两人距离拉近并互生情愫，遂从冤家发展成情侣。Ken为KKBoyz报名参加一项创作比赛。凯旋决定写一首名为《青春的旋律》作为参赛歌曲，并通过作品向青玥倾诉衷情。凯旋一直对作品不满意，Ken便找来学姐Chantay帮忙。一次，青玥去送食物给凯旋，撞见凯旋和Chantay举止亲密。青玥震惊，一时冲动下提出分手，凯旋心痛不已。.

programme.title: 百味人生 Food Of Life - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Marriage is a big event in life, each ethnic group has its own unique wedding customs and celebration. The new couple follows all customs to finalise their marital union and wedding banquet is held to celebrate and to express gratitude to relatives and friends who are present to give them blessings. (重)结婚是人生大事，各个民族各个籍贯的婚俗异彩纷呈，代表着各自的文化特色。男女双方遵照一切礼俗确定彼此的婚姻关系。新人在大婚之日，设喜宴邀亲友。新人在喜宴上表达对亲友的感谢，亲友在喜宴上传达对新人的祝福。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Ningzhi frames Xiantai to get into Zaiyong's good books. Yijun discovers that Xiantai has been transferred to the Logistics unit because of his relationship with Xiuqing. Yijun asks Xiuqing to let go of Xiantai so that his career life can be smoother. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)姜宁植组长为了讨好载永，故意陷害贤泰，令他被调组。益俊发现贤泰是因为绯闻而被故意贬到物流部的，于是要秀卿放弃跟贤泰的感情，好让贤泰的生活过得顺利一点。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) The teams on board are curious about Enzai's identity. Later they learnt that she is a surgeon. The head of the hospital wanted to hire her to work in the emergency unit but changed his mind when he discovered that she failed an operation previously. The news spread in the hospital ship and the captain ordered her out of the ship. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)全医疗船上的人都对恩在的身份感好奇，后来才得知她是陆地医院上有名的外科医生。她高超的技术受到院长赏识，亲自邀请她在急症室做事。后来发现恩在早前发生过医疗事故，医死了病人，立即解雇了她。恩在的过去传遍医疗船，船长也下令赶走她。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 67
programme.desc: Jinghui destroys the real seal with Minxiu's umbilical cord so that the bank will not be able to do a successful DNA test with Shiyan's sample. Xiulan passes away after asking Yingshu to protect Shiyan from harm. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)京慧把真正的脐带印鉴销毁，不让银行有机会跟世妍的基因样本做比对。秀兰跟大家一一道别后去世。遗言是要英淑在她去世后保护世妍。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 68
programme.desc: Minghuan bribes the bank manager successfully. Jinghui and Minghuan unlock Qitai's secret safe and realise that the safe only contains Qitai's white paper. Jinghui and Minghuan are disappointed. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明焕终于成功收买银行分行经理，并和京慧到银行开保险箱。岂料，保险箱面有只有奇泰亲笔写下的创业白皮书，没有现金或黄金之类值钱的东西。明焕和京慧失望不已。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 12
programme.desc: Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. “谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 20
programme.desc: While Kent and Kate are busy preparing their wedding, Long Xiong receives an SOS video from Ricky. Ricky says a chief gangster in Taiwan wants to kill him because he is having an affair with the latter's mistress. Concerned about her nephew's safety, Ling Xiong decides to fly to Taiwan with her bodyguards. (PG13-暴力镜头)正当令千佑与韦以柔，忙着筹备他们的婚礼，令熊突然收到令家就的求救视频。家就说他搞上了一位台湾黑帮老大的情妇，对方要杀他以雪耻。担忧侄儿的安危，令熊决定带着她的一帮保镖，即刻飞往台湾。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. programme.title: 创! (PG) Start Up! - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Sun Shao rejects Xuan's help. Graffiti's rival Enzo sues Graffiti for infringement of copyright and bars them from selling their product. Wen Xin recalls where the thumbdrive was kept. However, the thumbdrive was no longer there when they look for it. (PG)(重)孙少表态自己根本不需要殷萱的帮助，也不想她再理会自己的事情。Jessie还跟奇才接吻，这一幕被殷萱撞见。 Pepper收到律师信说明Enzo决定起诉Graffiti侵犯版权和禁售令。 文欣想起闪存盘就在盒子里，不过殷萱却在木制盒子找不到任何闪存盘。.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) 10 years ago, Singaporean couple Andy and Chinglee made a bold decision. They gave up their high paying jobs and moved to China Yunnan with their 2 kids, hoping to contribute back to the society. (重)一人行，暖人心说的是一对新加坡夫妇爱心点灯的故事。这对夫妻10年前放下高薪的工作、舒服的生活，带着两个孩子搬到云南走进中国落后又偏远的村庄，靠着自己的能力，帮助当地的少数民族解决生计问题。他们除了教导村民做手工艺品，还帮忙建学校、教学生英语，改善整个村子的环境和设施，也改变了村民的生活素质。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing initiates reconciliation with Xiantai, but Xiantai rejects her as he does not want to go in-between her marriage with Zaiyong. Xiuqing falls sick, but still insists on meeting Xiantai. Xiantai is touched by Xiuqing's persistence. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿无法把贤泰当成普通同事，向他建议重新交往，但贤泰不想成为破坏他人婚姻的人，不肯跟秀卿发展。秀卿患重感冒仍想着贤泰，深夜拖着生病的身体到贤泰家附近，约他见面，但贤泰却说不想见她。秀卿不肯离开。贤泰终于去跟秀卿见面，两人相拥。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The head of the medical team reveals to the team that Enzai was framed by Doctor Jin. Zhenghao's arm is severed in a storm. Under the guidance of the Chief surgeon, Jin Xiuquan, Enzai and Guo Xian successfully re-attached his arm. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)医疗船队长为恩在解围，说出恩在因被金道勋科长陷害而被调职。正浩在一场船难中，手腕断了。在金秀权院长的指导下，宋恩在与郭贤成功的把正浩断了的手腕接上。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 69
programme.desc: Yingshu passes Qitai's white paper to Shiyan. Everyone at home chips in to help Shiyan complete her orders, but Minghuan shows up with some men suddenly and attempts to snatch the clothes away. Minghuan threatens to destroy all of Shiyan's creations and not let her sell her clothes successfully. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)英淑从明焕手中拿到奇泰的创业白皮书，然后将白皮书交给世妍。全家人帮世妍赶工，终于做好被预订的衣服。交货当天，明焕带着手下出现抢夺世妍的衣服，并说日后不论世妍做出多少衣服都会把它们抢过来然后销毁，不让世妍开拓市场。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 70
programme.desc: The family members of the Yonghua factory victims set up a company and make Shiyan the chairperson. On behalf of the newly set-up company, Shiyan submits a pitch to Shen Li Zhe and wins the competition successfully. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)永华工厂受害者的家属成立了一家公司然后推举世妍为公司的代表。世妍以针对弱势族群的服装事业为主题，参加胜利者的公开招募，结果顺利取胜。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 1
programme.desc: Many Cambodian children suffer and die each year from waterborne disease. It is an unnecessary tragedy caused by poverty and very poor sanitation - especially for the villagers living in Siem Reap province. Host Khai Saharom takes on a special delivery - sponsoring and bringing water filters to a rural village to help combat and solve the problem. The journey promises to be eventful as Khai must himself drive the truck carrying the filters - something he has never done before. (首播)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 1
programme.desc: Serving fresh, hot piping food in vending machines is a relatively new innovation in Singapore. Host Bjorn meets with House of Seafood and QQ Rice to find out more about their vending machine plans. (首播)在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 21
programme.desc: While a wounded Ling Xiong and her worn-out companions hole up in a small house on a wooded hill, Kate is captured by the revenge-seeking gangsters. Together with Kate's two brothers, Kent risks his life to save her. (PG13-暴力镜头)令熊身受枪伤，与身疲力倦的子杰和清欣等，躲避在山上密林丛中的一间小屋里。这时候，冒险出去寻救兵的韦以柔，却遭那批为寻仇而来的黑帮份子，抓了起来。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)永华工厂受害者的家属成立了一家公司然后推举世妍为公司的代表。世妍以针对弱势族群的服装事业为主题，参加胜利者的公开招募，结果顺利取胜。.

programme.title: 上食堂 2 Food Notes 2 - EP 13

(重)(最后一集)不管是黑猪白猪，只要好吃的就是好猪？黑猪会比白猪好吃吗？六堆黑猪，六白黑猪，两头乌猪 – 台湾，日本和中国各地的黑猪有什么不同？金华火腿又是用哪种猪肉做的？这堂课将让你更加地认识猪大哥！.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 4

(重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 传说中的料理 II Legendary Cuisines 2 - EP 5

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永看到贤泰送秀卿回家，威胁贤泰说要解雇他，但贤泰丝毫不畏惧。秀卿向载永坦诚要跟贤泰在一起。载永竟然建议秀卿跟贤泰谈恋爱，玩腻后再跟他结婚。秀卿觉得载永荒谬不已。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 5

Enzai realises Guo Xian is the son of the famous doctor, Guo Cheng. Grandma Piao needs a liver transplant but Enzai discharges her from hospital; Guo Xian reprimands her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)薛财灿老师带一群学生医疗船接受身体检查，发现好友郭成的儿子郭贤在船上行医。恩在才得知郭贤的父亲是韩国著名医生。朴婆婆必须接受肝移植手术，郭贤责骂恩在没把她留著接受治理。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 71

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 1
programme.desc: The Vietnam War has left behind traumatic suffering and haunting nightmare to the Vietnamese people. It is also like a spell, casting heavy shackle on them which they are unable to break free. Is being regretful the biggest punishment in life for the war pushers or the helpless Agent Orange victims? (PG-部分画面令人不安)越战留给了越南百姓一扇无法启齿的伤痛窗口，带给他们的是一种挥之不去的梦魇，更像是一种咒语，给他们套上了沉痛的枷锁，使他们无法撑脱。人生最大的惩罚是后悔，是战争的推使者，抑或是没得选择的橙剂受害者呢？.
